name: Hybrid-translator
body: 多词典翻译 ========== ![Try it now in CWS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Crimx/hybrid-translator/master/assets/images/tryitnow.png "Click here to install this sample from the Chrome Web Store") 或[下载 crx](https://github.com/Crimx/hybrid-translator/releases/tag/3.0.0) Chrome 扩展，网页划词翻译。 必应词典+ 已改名为多词典划译，混合多个结果，仅做编程技术交流，请低调使用，嘘~~。 ![logo](https://github.com/Crimx/hybrid-translator/raw/master/assets/web-store/small.png) ![screen-shot](https://github.com/Crimx/hybrid-translator/raw/master/assets/web-store/screen-shot2.png) 版本 ---- 3.0.0 开发 ---- - 安装 [node.js](http://nodejs.org/) 和 [npm](https://www.npmjs.org/) - 全局安装 [grunt-cli](http://gruntjs.com/getting-started) ``` npm install -g grunt-cli ``` - 安装项目依赖，项目根目录运行 ``` npm install ``` - 启动 grunt，项目根目录运行 ``` grunt ``` - Chrome 加载 `/build/dev/` - 在 `/src/` 下开发
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
